sourcesContent:
import { useContext } from "react" import { TreeDataContext } from "./TreeDataContext" import "./Node.css" export interface NodeObject { node_id: number feature: string threshold: number impurity: number n_node_samples: number left: number right: number value: number[] } interface NodeId { id: number type: string } const Node = ({ id, type }: NodeId) => { const data: NodeObject[] = useContext(TreeDataContext) const node_data = data.find((a) => a.node_id === id) const content_node = `${node_data!.node_id} | ${node_data!.value}` const content_edge_left = `${ node_data!.feature } <= ${node_data!.threshold.round(2)}` const content_edge_right = `${node_data!.feature} > ${node_data!.threshold}` return ( <>
  • {content_node}
    {node_data!.left !== -1 && ( <>
    • {content_edge_left}
    )} {node_data!.right !== -1 && ( <>
    • {content_edge_right}
    )}
) } export default Node
